text: Artūrs Motmillers (1 October 1900 - 18 August 1980) was a Latvian long- distance runner. He competed at the 1924, 1928 and the 1936 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1900 births Category:1980 deaths Category:Athletes (track and field) at the 1924 Summer Olympics Category:Athletes (track and field) at the 1928 Summer Olympics Category:Athletes (track and field) at the 1936 Summer Olympics Category:Latvian male long-distance runners Category:Latvian male marathon runners Category:Olympic athletes of Latvia Category:Sportspeople from Riga
title: Artūrs Motmillers
